actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require that the appointment of the Commissioner of Food and Drugs be subject to the advice and consent of the Senate.
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate

summary.text: Requires that the appointment of the Commissioner of Food and Drugs be subject to the advice and consent of the Senate.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require that the appointment of the Commissioner of Food and Drugs be subject to the advice and consent of the Senate.
